abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of this Kabul Urban Roads
            Improvement Project for Afghanistan is to improve traffic
            flow on priority corridors or segments of the main urban
            roads in Kabul. The one year extension is based on: (i) the
            project implementation status; (ii) Kabul Municipality (KM)
            improved project management, including making timely project
            payments; and its action plan formulated to complete the
            project activities by the revised closing date; (iii) the
            contractor's improved contract execution progress and
            quality of works, and (iv) the Islamic strengthened on-site
            supervision and quality control effort. The extension is
            necessary to enable completion of project works and cover
            the defects liability period, thereby achieving the project objectives.
